headline: MotorTrend CEO on why the Ram 1500 won 'Truck of the Year' and what tariffs would mean for US buyers
summary: The MotorTrend Truck of the Year wasn’t an EV like the Rivian R1T or Ford F-150 Lightning. A gas-powered truck won top honors.

raw.summary: The MotorTrend Truck of the Year wasn’t an EV like the Rivian R1T or Ford F-150 Lightning. A gas-powered truck won top honors.

headline: Shareholder Alert for Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBD)
summary: A new complaint was filed against Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (WBD) by shareholder (plaintiff) Richard Collura on November 25, 2024, in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York. The defendants in the complaint are the company, CEO and President David Zaslav, and CFO Gunnar Wiedenfels. The plaintiff alleges that he bought WBD stock at artificially inflated prices between February 23, 2024, and August 7, 2024 (the “Class Period”). The plaintiff is now seeking compensation for

headline: Netflix co-CEO shakes off M&A in 2025: ‘We’re better builders than buyers’
summary: Netflix is not interested in engaging in media M&A next year — even if its competitors appear more interested.
